relationships.description: Ribis is communicating business and political information to Epstein
Ribis makes a confident prediction about Trump's political future

analysis.purpose: To inform Jeffrey Epstein about a critical report regarding Davis and Caesars, and to share a confident political prediction about Donald Trump
analysis.significance: Shows business and political intelligence sharing between Ribis and Epstein, including early prediction of Trump's presidential success

notable_quotes: I told u weeks ago that Davis would issue a report critical of Leon and board read article in Post business page re Davis Report and Caesars

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present in this communication

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - this is a business/political communication sharing information and predictions

details: Reference to article in Post business page about Davis Report and Caesars

public_knowledge.context: This email references business reporting about Caesars and contains political prediction about Donald Trump's presidential prospects in 2016

analysis.summary: Nicholas Ribis emails Jeffrey Epstein to share information about a critical report regarding Davis and Caesars that was covered in the Post business page, and confidently predicts that Donald Trump will become President.
